mapper.select: SELECT d.department_id, d.department_name, d.manager_id, e.last_name, l.city FROM departments d left join employees e on d.manager_id = e.employee_id left join locations l on d.location_id = l.location_id
mapper.insert: INSERT_EMP = INSERT INTO DEPARTMENTS DEPARTMENT_ID, DEPARTMENT_NAME, MANAGER_ID VALUES(#{department_id}, #{department_name}, #{manager_id})
